languages.text: "Ты настолько уверен{mf||а} в том, что культ не пустил корни где-либо еще в твоих владениях? Боюсь, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, мне придется задержаться. Кроме того, я нахожусь в вашей свите не только из-за своей миссии, но и в качестве..." {n}Хейнрикс запинается, силясь подобрать слово.{/n} "...благосклонного вашему труду советника. Дабы, напомню, "обеспечить сопровождение и содействие в делах великих и малых, что призваны уберечь владения {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} от врагов его".

traits.locale_text: "Ты настолько уверен{mf||а} в том, что культ не пустил корни где-либо еще в твоих владениях? Боюсь, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, мне придется задержаться. Кроме того, я нахожусь в вашей свите не только из-за своей миссии, но и в качестве..." {n}Хейнрикс запинается, силясь подобрать слово.{/n} "...благосклонного вашему труду советника. Дабы, напомню, "обеспечить сопровождение и содействие в делах великих и малых, что призваны уберечь владения {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} от врагов его".

languages.text: "Are you so certain that the cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"
languages.original_text: "Ты настолько уверен{mf||а} в том, что культ не пустил корни где-либо еще в твоих владениях? Боюсь, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, мне придется задержаться. Кроме того, я нахожусь в вашей свите не только из-за своей миссии, но и в качестве..." {n}Хейнрикс запинается, силясь подобрать слово.{/n} "...благосклонного вашему труду советника. Дабы, напомню, "обеспечить сопровождение и содействие в делах великих и малых, что призваны уберечь владения {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} от врагов его".

traits.locale_text: "Are you so certain that the Cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, Rogue Trader. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies.'"

"Are you so certain that the Cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"

languages.text: “你就这么确定，邪教没有在你王国的其他地方扎根吗？恐怕我还得再呆上一段时间，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。而且我之所以会与你同行，不仅仅是为了完成我自己的任务，也同样是为了担任……”{n}海因里希犹豫了一下，努力寻找着合适的词。{/n}“……你的顾问，对你的努力致以同情。我得提醒你，我有要务在身。我奉命‘保护{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}领土不受敌人侵犯，在各种大小型行动中提供保护与支持’。”
languages.original_text: "Are you so certain that the cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"

traits.locale_text: “你就这么确定，邪教没有在你王国的其他地方扎根吗？恐怕我还得再呆上一段时间，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。而且我之所以会与你同行，不仅仅是为了完成我自己的任务，也同样是为了担任……”{n}海因里希犹豫了一下，努力寻找着合适的词。{/n}“……你的顾问，对你的努力致以同情。我得提醒你，我有要务在身。我奉命‘保护{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}领土不受敌人侵犯，在各种大小型行动中提供保护与支持’。”

languages.original_text: "Are you so certain that the Cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, Rogue Trader. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies.'"

languages.text: «¿Tan convencid{mf|o|a} está de que el Culto no ha extendido sus raíces por otras zonas de su dominio? Me temo que tendré que permanecer aquí un tiempo más, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante{/g}. Además, no solo formo parte de su séquito para cumplir mi propia misión, sino también para servir como...». {n}Heinrix duda, buscando la palabra correcta.{/n} «... un consejero afín a su causa. Le recuerdo que tengo órdenes de "proporcionar escolta y apoyo de forma directa e indirecta con propósito de salvaguardar los territorios del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} contra sus enemigos"».
languages.original_text: "Are you so certain that the cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tan convencid{mf|o|a} está de que el Culto no ha extendido sus raíces por otras zonas de su dominio? Me temo que tendré que permanecer aquí un tiempo más, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante{/g}. Además, no solo formo parte de su séquito para cumplir mi propia misión, sino también para servir como...». {n}Heinrix duda, buscando la palabra correcta.{/n} «... un consejero afín a su causa. Le recuerdo que tengo órdenes de "proporcionar escolta y apoyo de forma directa e indirecta con propósito de salvaguardar los territorios del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} contra sus enemigos"».

languages.text: 「教団があなたの領地の他の場所に根を広げていないと、あなたは確信しているのか？私はもうしばらくここに留まらねばならないようだ、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}。それに、私があなたの従者になったのは、自分の任務のためだけでなく…」{n}ハインリックスはためらいながら、適切な言葉を探していた。{/n}「…あなたの尽力に共感的な助言者となるためでもある。忘れないでほしい。私は、『{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の領土を敵から守るため、いかなる行いにおいても護衛と支援を提供する』ことを命じられているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Are you so certain that the cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"

traits.locale_text: 「教団があなたの領地の他の場所に根を広げていないと、あなたは確信しているのか？私はもうしばらくここに留まらねばならないようだ、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}。それに、私があなたの従者になったのは、自分の任務のためだけでなく…」{n}ハインリックスはためらいながら、適切な言葉を探していた。{/n}「…あなたの尽力に共感的な助言者となるためでもある。忘れないでほしい。私は、『{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の領土を敵から守るため、いかなる行いにおいても護衛と支援を提供する』ことを命じられているのだ」

languages.text: "Seid Ihr Euch wirklich so sicher, dass der Kult seine Wurzeln nicht auch in andere Gebiete Eures Reichs ausgestreckt hat? Ich fürchte, ich werde noch eine Weile bleiben müssen, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}. Zudem bin ich nicht allein meiner eigenen Mission wegen Teil Eures Gefolges, ich diene auch als"{n}, Heinrix zögert und sucht nach dem richtigen Wort, {/n}"als Berater, der Euren Bemühungen gegenüber wohlgesonnen ist. Ich darf Euch daran erinnern, dass ich Befehl habe, 'Geleit und Unterstützung zu bieten, durch große wie kleine Taten, welche die Territorien des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} gegen seine Feinde beschützen.'"
languages.original_text: "Are you so certain that the cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr Euch wirklich so sicher, dass der Kult seine Wurzeln nicht auch in andere Gebiete Eures Reichs ausgestreckt hat? Ich fürchte, ich werde noch eine Weile bleiben müssen, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}. Zudem bin ich nicht allein meiner eigenen Mission wegen Teil Eures Gefolges, ich diene auch als"{n}, Heinrix zögert und sucht nach dem richtigen Wort, {/n}"als Berater, der Euren Bemühungen gegenüber wohlgesonnen ist. Ich darf Euch daran erinnern, dass ich Befehl habe, 'Geleit und Unterstützung zu bieten, durch große wie kleine Taten, welche die Territorien des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} gegen seine Feinde beschützen.'"

languages.text: « Pensez-vous réellement que le culte n'a pas corrompu d'autres régions de votre domaine ? Non, je crains de devoir rester encore un peu, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. De plus, si j'ai intégré votre entourage, c'est non seulement dans l'intérêt de ma mission, mais aussi pour vous servir de... » {n}Heinrix hésite le temps de trouver le bon mot.{/n} « ... conseiller acquis à votre cause. Permettez-moi de vous rappeler que j'ai pour ordre de vous escorter et de vous aider dans toute entreprise visant à protéger les territoires de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de ses ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "Are you so certain that the cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"

traits.locale_text: « Pensez-vous réellement que le culte n'a pas corrompu d'autres régions de votre domaine ? Non, je crains de devoir rester encore un peu, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. De plus, si j'ai intégré votre entourage, c'est non seulement dans l'intérêt de ma mission, mais aussi pour vous servir de... » {n}Heinrix hésite le temps de trouver le bon mot.{/n} « ... conseiller acquis à votre cause. Permettez-moi de vous rappeler que j'ai pour ordre de vous escorter et de vous aider dans toute entreprise visant à protéger les territoires de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de ses ennemis. »

languages.text: "Tarikat'ın diyarın başka yerlerine de uzanmadığından bu kadar emin misin? Korkarım bana bir müddet daha katlanacaksın {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}. Üstelik maiyetine girme sebebim yalnızca görevim değil. Ben isterim ki..." {n}Heinrix, çekinerek doğru sözü bulmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Uğraşlarında sana danışmanlık edeyim. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} bölgelerini düşmanlardan koruyan her eylemi, küçük büyük ayırt etmeden gözetip destekleme vazifem olduğunu da hatırlatırım.'"
languages.original_text: "Are you so certain that the cult has not spread its roots elsewhere in your domain? I fear I will have to remain a while longer, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Besides, I am in your retinue not solely for the sake of my own mission, but also to serve as..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, reaching for the right word.{/n} "...an advisor sympathetic to your endeavours. I am under orders, I remind you, to 'provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} against its enemies.'"

Üstelik maiyetine girme sebebim yalnızca görevim değil. Ben isterim ki..." {n}Heinrix çekinerek doğru sözü bulmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "...Uğraşlarında sana danışmanlık edeyim. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} bölgelerini düşmanlardan koruyan her eylemi, küçük büyük ayırt etmeden gözetip destekleme vazifem olduğunu da hatırlatırım.'"
